quoteText:
li>
<li>Information you have shared with others (e.g., Reviews, forum postings) will continue to be publicly visible on Airbnb, even after your Airbnb Account is cancelled.
However, attribution of such information to you will be removed
title: Airbnb will continue using anonymized user-generated content even after account deletion

tosdr.case: This service will continue using anonymized user-generated content even after erasure of personal information
